summary: Gamblers who "took" an out-of-town sucker in a crooked poker game feel shadowy vengeance closing in on them.
cast: Charlton Heston|Lizabeth Scott|Viveca Lindfors|Dean Jagger|Don DeFore|Jack Webb|Ed Begley|Harry Morgan|Walter Sande|Mark Keuning|Mike Mazurki|Fred Aldrich|John Bishop|John Breen|Walter Burke|Hamilton Camp|Jack Carroll|Bill Cartledge|Jack Chefe|Sally Corner|Charles Dayton|Mike Donovan|Jimmie Dundee|Bob Evans|Sam Finn|Byron Foulger|Mickey Golden|Greta Granstedt|Marcoreta Hellman|Stan Johnson|Hubie Kerns|Warren Mace|George Magrill|Mike Mahoney|Joan Morgan|Jay Morley|William H. O'Brien|Ralph Peters|Ben Pollack|Stanley Prager|Dewey Robinson|Franz Roehn|Kasey Rogers|Edward Rose|Jeffrey Sayre|James R. Scott|Bill Sheehan|Charles Sherlock|Owen Tyree|Otto Waldis
title: Ciudad en sombras
